title: Parent Trap
summary: A shared to-do list and errand tracking app to help parents keep track of the needs of their kids.

title: ThriftBuyer
summary: A website to help professional shoppers keep track of the best places to buy thrift and niche items offline.

title: Hacking Simulator
summary: A futuristic take on the classic Hangman created with vanilla JS.

title: Don't Match the Socks
summary: A game built with React in which you avoid matching your socks.

title: Pocket Skirmish
summary: A deconstructed RPG, focusing purely on a few rounds of combat, made with jQuery.

title: Overwatch Trivia
summary: A timed trivia game, which quizes users about the popular game Overwatch.

title: Multiplayer Rock Paper Scisors
summary: A multiplayer Rock/Paper/Scissors game with real time chat.

title: Multiplayer Othello in Python
summary: It's a recreation of the popular game Othello (aka: reversi) implemented in Python.

title: Clue Hunt: QR
summary: Create and mange real life clue hunt games with this interactive platform.

title: Media API Bot
summary: Interfaces with Spotify, BandsInTown, and the Open Movie Database in order to give users info about songs, concerts, and movies.

title: Contracted Automation Script
summary: Written for a web marketing contractor in order to automate a routine task.
